Job Description: Leads study on CMS functionalities: explore current system, interview users, prototypes, review card scheme requirements etc, and communicate such requirements to solution vendor.Manage SIT, QA, and UAT activities with vendor and project stakeholders, and offer training to stakeholders/users.Ensure system compliance with industry standards and various schemes’ requirements, mandatory changes, and system maintenance.Manages monitoring of system connectivity and networking to identify downtimes and resolve the issues.Manages and coordinates with system vendors to resolve issues.Manage card payment system issues reported by users and resolve the issues for users effectively.Fulfill user’s request for information and request for investigation into any system/application problems.Other tasks assigned by the management.
Job Requirement: Bachelor/ Master’s degree in any IT related fields.Minimum two-year experience in card payment system support with supervisory roles.Knowledge and experience in database management, Ms. SQL server and Oracle.Good computer literacy in other programs, e.g., MS project plan, office, spread sheet, and so on.Good command in English in reading, writing, and speaking.Excellent interpersonal skills.Be proactive and good team work and customer service orientation skill.Able to work under pressure.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Analyst the issue then forward to specific technical team for the fixed.Provide training and carry out testing to ensure alignment with business requirements, processes, and key operational controls.Prepare bill payment performance report to management and internal stakeholders.Support and create required documents to improve current and new system.Develop payment service and solution (API, Web service) to support business requirement.Other tasks assigned by the management.
Job Requirement: Bachelor degree in computer science, IT or equivalent.One year of experience in a financial institution and/or software support.Experience or knowledge in application programing.Fast learner, innovative, abilities in problem-solving, willingness to learn new things, team work spirit, and work under pressing situation.Good communication skills, you should be able to explain technical scenario’s to a non-technical product owner.Good computer literacy in good English speaking, writing, and reading.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
- Develops and executes product strategies to drive performance targeting Corporate, Individual Business SMEs and Salaried Workers for loans and deposits. 
- Develops and executes consumer and product proposition, communication needs, and marketing activities to deliver consumer promise to the marketed segment. 
- Develops new products/services that is relevant in current competitive environment to cater to the needs of targeted segment 
- Provides market feedback to the company leadership regarding competitive offerings, prospect needs to generate product development ideas 
- Proposes and manages partnership with FIs/companies/other key strategic stakeholders to ensure sustainable partnership and profitability. 
- Develops strategies and execution to drive customer acquisition and retention 
- Conducts consumer research to monitor changing consumer behavior in the financial segment and initiate business change proposal to adapt to the needs 
- Initiates and implements campaigns to drive business and customer segment performance 
- Develops and ensure key business metrics for each segment are in place and monitor for better performance 
- Initiates and implements all the related product development projects and services in the assigned segments 
- Plans and coordinates the implementation of business plans and the penetration of new markets 
- Collaborates/coordinates with marketing unit, business operations, sales, customer services and channel delivery team to deliver on targets.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in business administration or related fields 
- Minimum 3 -5 years work experience in product development and management 
- Experience in marketing management is an added advantage 
- Previous working experience in MFI, Bank or FMCG (FMCG would be ideal) 
- Excellent negotiation skills, proven track record of successfully pitching for new business 
- Independent & a self-starter 
- English proficiency 
- Computer literate; especially in excel
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
•	Identify credit training and development needs within the bank through assessment method and regular consultation with branch managers
•	Design and deliver credit training and development programs based on both the bank’s and the individual's needs
•	Produce credit training materials for in-house courses and evaluate the credit training programs
•	Monitor and control the costs of planned credit training programs and keep them within budgets
•	Conduct follow-up studies of all completed credit training to evaluate and measure results
•	Provide coaching and monitoring support to credit staff in training efforts, provide effective growth and development opportunities
•	Support in organizing of credit training venues, logistics, accommodation as required, to achieve efficient training attendance and delivery
•	Support in developing, organizing and maintenance credit training manuals, multimedia visual aids, and other educational materials
•	Administrative support in credit training processes, including databases, to ensure training activities are recorded and reported on both internal and external
•	Keep up to date with new training methodologies and courses on subjects relevant to Credit department
•	Provide reporting to relevant Branches/Departments if needed
•	Conduct orientation sessions and on-the-job credit training for new comer
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree in any field such as economics; social sciences; business administration; management; marketing
•	At least two years of experience in the bank or micro-finance sector, prefer in Credit Department
•	Good understanding of Bank and Microfinance industry
•	Honesty, positive attitude and ability to think creatively, as well as to relate well to others and to work independently without close supervision
•	Willing to travel to branches
•	Committed to self-improvement
•	Good in presentation skill
•	Good written and spoken communication skills, both English and Khmer
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

job title: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកបច្ចេកវិទ្យាព័ត៌មានចំនួន ០២រូប
position: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកបច្ចេកវិទ្យាព័ត៌មានចំនួន ០២រូប
Job Description:
ផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ PIP-DBMS ផ្នែក Front-End - ០១រូប
o	មានសញ្ញាបត្រទាបបំផុតបរិញ្ញាបត្រទាក់ទងនឹងជំនាញវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រកុំព្យូទ័រ បច្ចេកវិទ្យាព័ត៌មាន ឬជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធ
o	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ០២ឆ្នាំ លើជំនាញការកសាង និងមើលថែគេហទំព័រ
o	មានចំណេះដឹងពីការកសាងប្រព័ន្ធ និង USER INTERFACE របស់គេហទំព័រ
o	មានចំណេះដឹង HTML and Web Frameworks
o	មានជំនាញខាង HTML/XHTML/CSS and HTML5/CSS3
o	មានចំណេះដឹងទូលាយ Object-Oriented Programming with PHP, ASP.NET, JSP and JavaScript
o	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក  MySQL, SQL Server or Oracle
o	ចំណេះដឹងខាង Integrate and Configure Modules with Laravel Framework
o	ការស្វែងយល់ពីតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់ (Front-End) និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
o	រចនាបថនិងរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សម្រាប់គេហទំព័រនិងកម្មវិធី
o	ចងក្រងឯកសារនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលសម្រាប់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់
o	ចេះស្ទាត់លើភាសាខ្មែរ និងអាចអាន ស្តាប់ សរសេរ និងនិយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ
Job Requirement:
ផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ PIP-DBMS ផ្នែក Back-End - ០១រូប
o	មានសញ្ញាបត្រទាបបំផុតត្រឹមបរិញ្ញាបត្រទាក់ទងនឹងជំនាញវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រកុំព្យូទ័រ ព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ឬជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធ
o	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ០២ឆ្នាំ លើជំនាញ Database Administration
o	មានសមត្ថភាព និងចំណេះដឹងយល់ពីតម្រូវការរបស់ Front-End Users និងយល់ពីបញ្ហា
o	មានការយល់ដឹងច្បាស់ពី Data Management ដូចជា Permission, Recovery, Security ...
o	ធ្លាប់ប្រើប្រាស់ Oracle, SQL, NoSQL and Query development
o	ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាមួយនឹង .Net Framework, JavaScript, HTML និង Oracle
o	មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់ Microsoft Windows Server, Linux or Unix
o	កែប្រែសំណុំទិន្នន័យយោងទៅតាមការស្នើសុំ
o	ផ្តល់ការគាំទ្រការគ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យដល់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់
o	ចងក្រងឯកសារនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអ្នកប្រើប្រាស់
o	សរសេរឯកសារមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ (metadata)
o	យល់ដឹងពីដំណើរការនិងបច្ចេកទេស និងតាមតម្រូវការអ្នកប្រើប្រាស់ដើម្បីធានាបានគុណភាព
o	ចេះស្ទាត់លើភាសាខ្មែរ និងអាចអាន ស្តាប់ សរសេរ និង និយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ

បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធ តាមរយៈ Email យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹម ថ្ងៃអង្គារ ៧កើត ខែជេស្ឋ ឆ្នាំឆ្លូវ ត្រីស័ក ពុទ្ធសករាជ ២៥៦៥ ថ្ងៃទី១៨ ខែឧសភា ឆ្នាំ២០២១ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។

Job Description: • Developing and administering human resources plans and procedures that relate to company personnel• Planning, organizing, and controlling the activities and -actions of the HR and Admin department• Manage and Support the manpower recruitment of the company• Contributing to the development of HR department goals, objectives, and systems• Implementing and revising a company’s compensation program• Creating and revising job descriptions• Conducting annual salary and benefit surveys• Analyzing, and updating the company’s salary budget• Developing, analyzing and updating the company’s evaluation program• Developing, revising, and recommending personnel policies and procedures• Maintaining and revising the company’s handbook on policies and procedures• Performing benefits administration• Maintaining affirmative action programs• Conducting new employee orientations and employee relations counseling• Provide daily advise to staffs on human resource issues• Overseeing exit interviews• Maintain records and reports• Improve employee relations• Participating in administrative staff meetings• Maintaining company directory and other organizational charts• Provide related tasks that assigned my Top Management from time to time.
Job Requirement: • Master Degree in HR Management or equivalent • Have 5 years of experience in HR & Admin• Have good communication in English and Chinese is a plus• Have good knowledge of labor law, recruitment, compensation and compliance. • Have advanced computer skills, including proficiency in MS Office and Microsoft Dynamics.• Strong in communication skills, results-oriented;• Flexible and Strong Leadership Management. • Honesty and Morality
Company Profile: CYCS is a company founded in 2018 and aims to bring together the most popular brands in Cambodia, such as Illy Coffee, Master Kong, Haagen-Dazs, Want Want Hot Kid, Paulaner. By combining our multinational expertise with our deep roots in diverse local cultures, we’re continuing to provide a range of products to suit a wealth of consumers. We’re also strengthening our strong relationships in the emerging markets we believe will be significant for our future growth.

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកដឹកជញ្ជួន (បើកបរឡាន)​
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកដឹកជញ្ជួន (បើកបរឡាន)​
Job Description:
- បើកបរឡាន និង មើលថែទាំឡានជាប្រចាំ
- ដឹកជញ្ជូនកម្ម៉ង់ទាន់ពេលវេលាតាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់
- មើលថែរក្សាឡាន មើលទឹក ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន និងគ្រឿងផ្សេងៗទៀតដើម្បីអោយឡានដំណើរការបានល្អ មិនមានផលប៉ះពាល់ពេលម៉ោងបំពេញការងារ
- សំអាតឡានអោយមានអនាម័យជានិច្ច ទាំងក្នុង និង ក្រៅឡាន
- ទុកដាក់ និងមើលការខុសត្រូវលើសំភារះក្នុងឡាន
មិនអោយមានការបែកបាក់​បណ្តាលមកពីការធ្វេស​ប្រហែស រឺគ្មានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់
- រក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន/បុគ្គលិក
- ធានាថាដឹកជញ្ជូនកម្ម៉ង់ទាន់ពេលវេលាជូនអតិថិជន
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍បើកបរឡានយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ
- ត្រូវមានបណ្ណ័បើកបរ
- អត់ធ្មត់ តស៊ូនឹងការងារ
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសា អង់គ្លេស​
- ប្រាក់ខែអាចចរចាបាន ហើយនិងទទួលបានអត្ថប្រយោជន៏ជាច្រើន​
- បើមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមទំនាក់ទំនង

Job Description:

- Knowledge of window server active directory, DNS, DHCP, Print Server, and file server
- English proficiency
- Willing to support on weekend/holidays based on business needs
- Be proactive, strong commitment, and able to travel as business needs.

Job Description:
Job Description:

- Work with business units to determine and write-up business requirements document and Development objectives.
- Develop technical and functional specifications document for Developments by working closely with vendors and relevant stakeholders.
- Determine time, cost estimates, and resources and plan Development activities for respective Developments.
- Develop new in-house applications or systems according to business needs.
- Work with vendor to raise the request for proposal subject to the business requirements.
- Utilize programming principles, tools, and techniques to write application codes to be in line with relevant technology procedures.
- Plan, coordinate, and execute Development activities to ensure timely completion as agreed.
- Ensure Development deliverables meet business requirements in terms of budget, business case, timeline, and so forth.
- Work out the relevant stakeholders to prepare test cases and strategies for unit testing and integration testing.
- Perform code reviews to identify basic technical and logical errors to eliminate the loopholes or weaknesses.
- Resolve application development / Development issues in a timely manner.
- Schedule meetings with customers and management to discuss Development status, issues/risks, and milestones.
- Develop ad-hoc and standard Development reports for management and monthly report is produced.
- Adhere to company policies and regulatory standards.
- Others assigned by Line Manager
Job Requirement:
- Degree(s) in IT, Informatics Economics, or related fields
- Minimum 3 years of experience in Web Development, M-Application (Android) Development, other related fields
- Knowledgeable in Banking or FinTech industry is an advantage.
- English writing and speaking proficiency are a must
- Good knowledge in Web Development, PHP, Laravel, and so on
- Good knowledge in Project Management and able to handle many projects at the same time.
- Be able to work under tight deadline and willing to work under pressure

Job Description: • Develops appropriate supply chain strategy to maximize efficient shipping ways/ route at the lowest possible cost.• Leads all stakeholders (internal, external) in the supply chain to execute best practices and measuring performance• Directs and coordinates global supply chain functions through strategy, resource optimization, profitability maximization• Realize 3rd parties evaluation and monitoring• Works with plant, warehouse, and logistics departments to determine and set up intercompany transfers.• Works directly with sales department to determine most cost-effective distribution solution and inventory needed• Monitors and corrects inventory levels at warehouses and maximize working capital.• Works with freight forwards and transportation companies to set best route and rate (reviews and approves all freight terms and agreements).• Collaborates with finance department to determine best practice for freight in and freight consolidation.• Member of the operations staff, responsible to routinely report on department KPIs along with appropriate analysis and countermeasures where necessary.• Provide monthly basis brands performance reports (stock in and out)• Centralize landed cost, prices, scheme and promotion• Other jobs assigned by management

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
